title: Why hasn't Captain America: Civil War been on the movie channels HBO, Starz, or Showtime?

og.title: Why hasn't Captain America: Civil War been on the movie channels HBO, Starz, or Showtime?
og.description: Answer (1 of 4): Netflix signed a deal 3 years back as the “Premium Channel” outlet for Disney (previously it was on Starz). So, all Disney films after disc/HV release are on Netflix. After its play on Netflix, Disney then licenses them to cable. After X years, Disney might offer them to another ...
